Last Tango In Halifax is a drama series which sees Celia Dawson and Alan Buttershaw meeting up after having not seen each other for about 60 years. Theyâ€™re reunited via Facebook and discover that it was an unfortunate twist of fate that prevented them from getting together all those years ago. Their passionate feelings for each other are soon reignited.
